root.loadpage: SELECT * FROM db2ibank.content WHERE pageid='[[%%PAGEID%%]]' AND startdate <= '[[%%DATE%%]]' AND stopdate >= '[[%%DATE%%]]'
root.logmaxid: SELECT MAX(LOGID) AS LID FROM DB2IBANK.LOADAPBEGIN WHERE LOGID LIKE '[[%%LOGDATE%%]]%'
root.p0001: INSERT INTO db2ibank.content ( pageid, para, tom, session, startdate, stopdate, ischeck, pst) VALUES ( '[[%%PAGEID%%]]' , '[[%%PARA%%]]' , '[[%%TOM%%]]' , '[[%%SESSION%%]]' , '[[%%STARTDATE%%]]' , '[[%%STOPDATE%%]]' , [[%%ISCHECK%%]] , '[[%%PST%%]]' )
root.loadapbegin: INSERT INTO db2ibank.LOADAPBEGIN ( LOGID, STARTTIME, SESSID, TXNID, APTYPE, COMEFROM, SIF) VALUES ( '[[%%LOGID%%]]' , '[[%%STARTTIME%%]]' , '[[%%SESSID%%]]' , '[[%%TXNID%%]]' , '[[%%APTYPE%%]]' , '[[%%COMEFROM%%]]' , '[[%%SIF%%]]' )
root.loadapend: INSERT INTO db2ibank.LOADAPEND ( LOGID, ENDTIME, SOF, SYSMSGCODE, TXNMSGCODE, RUNTIME) VALUES ( '[[%%LOGID%%]]' , '[[%%ENDTIME%%]]' , ? , '[[%%SYSMSGCODE%%]]' , '[[%%TXNMSGCODE%%]]' , [[%%RUNTIME%%]] )
